name: A Summer's Ride
description:
A gift made for Flowerditch! Made as apart of the Bitsy Community Secret Santa jam!

A Dream...

Jin has lived with her mother in the Great Forest all of her life, a magical place home to wondrous plants, animals, and spirits.  Unlike last summer, Jin is in good health and ready to tackle the ride to Wisdom Peak! However, maybe it was good she missed last year as a terrible creature chased every rider away from the peak.  Only thanks to a Security Coucilman by the name of Ja'Lor, did everyone make it home safe.

Shattered...

The night before Jin is set to depart, an earthquake strikes nearby her home of Narem, and the terrible creature from last summer prompts a magical grounding by her mom, and a lockdown of the town!

Rebellious Youth...

Terrifying monster, groundings be damned, Jin is going  on the ride of her life!
